captions.text: - I JUST LEARNED--

BECAUSE I DO RESEARCH
ABOUT PEOPLE

THAT I'M GONNA TALK TO
LATER IN THE DAY--

THAT YOU'VE HAD
QUITE AN INTERESTING LIFE
IN THE LAST YEAR OR SO,
AND I DIDN'T KNOW THAT,

'CAUSE I REALLY DON'T
PAY ATTENTION TO THIS STUFF.
BUT WHAT HAPPENED?
[laughter]

- MAN, I WENT THROUGH,
LIKE, AN EXISTENTIAL CRISIS...
- UH-HUH.

- WHICH INTO SOME KIND
OF, LIKE, EXPLORATION, REALLY.

I HAD SOME HICCUPS,
YOU KNOW, SOME JUDGMENT ERROR.

- UH-HUH.
- YEAH.

- AND SO ONE OF THE THINGS
THAT YOU DID IS,

YOU WENT OUT--
I DIDN'T KNOW ANY OF THIS.
I DON'T KNOW WHERE--

I DON'T READ THE MAGAZINES,
I GUESS.

SO YOU WORE A PAPER BAG
ON YOUR HEAD

THAT SAID YOU WEREN'T FAMOUS
ANYMORE OR SOMETHING LIKE THAT.

YOU SAID
YOU WERE NO LONGER--

AND THAT WAS
AT A RED CARPET EVENT.

- FOR "NYMPHOMANIAC," YEAH.
- UH-HUH, OKAY.

SO--SO YOU WORE THAT.
- YEAH.
- ALL RIGHT.
AND THEN TO APOLOGIZE,

THEN YOU DID
A PERFORMANCE PIECE,
WHICH THAT SORT OF WAS,

BUT YOU DID
A PERFORMANCE ART PIECE

WHERE PEOPLE COULD COME
AND SEE YOU

AND SIT AND DO AND SAY
WHATEVER THEY WANTED TO YOU.

- YEAH, AND WE HAD,
LIKE, A TABLE
WITH ALL THESE IMPLEMENTS.

YOU KNOW, THERE'S A LIKE
AN INDIANA JONES WHIP
AND SOME PLIERS AND--

- WHAT?
- YEAH, YEAH.
IT WAS SORT OF NO RULES.

- LIKE IF PEOPLE WANTED
TO USE THOSE THINGS ON YOU?

- YEAH, 'CAUSE THERE WAS A LOT,
LIKE, OF NEGATIVITY ONLINE,

SO I THOUGHT, "ALL RIGHT,
WELL, LET'S JUST--

"YOU KNOW, LET'S SEE
WHAT THIS NEGATIVITY'S ABOUT,
AND LET'S INVITE IT IN."

- LET'S PUT PLIERS AND A WHIP
IN FRONT OF PEOPLE.

- YEAH, YEAH, AND SO I FIGURED,
YOU KNOW,

MAYBE SOMEBODY WOULD, LIKE,
PULL MY FINGERNAILS OFF.

YOU KNOW, 'CAUSE BASICALLY
I WAS SITTING THERE

WITH THE BAG ON MY HEAD
IN THIS ROOM,

AND IT WAS
THESE ONE-ON-ONE SITUATIONS

WHERE, YOU KNOW, WE'D INVITE
ONE PERSON IN AT A TIME.

THEY COULD DO
WHATEVER THEY WANTED.

THERE'S ALSO, LIKE,
A BOWL OF THESE
REALLY MALICIOUS TWEETS,

AND SOME PEOPLE WOULD
JUST COME IN AND READ 'EM

AND JUST--AND I WAS SITTING
IN THERE BROKEN, YOU KNOW?

I WAS REALLY TRULY APOLOGETIC,
AND SO I WAS SORT OF,

LIKE, APOLOGIZING TO THE PUBLIC
IN A WAY.

AND SO I THOUGHT FOR SURE
PEOPLE WERE GONNA COME IN
AND BE SUPER MEAN,

'CAUSE THAT'S
WHAT I HAD BEEN READING,

BUT IT WASN'T THAT WAY AT ALL;
IT WAS VERY HUMAN.

ONCE THEY GOT IN THERE,
EVERYTHING CHANGED.

THEY STOPPED LOOKING AT ME
AS, LIKE, AN OBJECT.

THEY START LOOKING AT ME
AS, LIKE, A HUMAN.

AND THEY WERE VERY LOVING.
IT WAS REALLY HUMAN.

- WOW.
- YEAH, IT WAS NICE.

- THAT WAS VERY BRAVE OF YOU,
AND--GOOD.

AND MOST PEOPLE
WHO DO SAY MEAN THINGS,

IT TURNS OUT, ARE THE COWARDS
AND THE CHICKEN PEOPLE

THAT JUST STAY THERE
BEHIND THEIR KEYBOARDS.

- WELL, I THINK IT'S--
I WOULD--

I THINK WE BOTH SUFFER
FROM THE SAME THING, YOU KNOW?

I GOT INTO THIS INDUSTRY
'CAUSE, LIKE, I HAD THIS VOID,

YOU KNOW,
A KID OF ABANDONMENT,

AND SO I THOUGHT BEING GOOD
AT BEING AN ACTOR

WOULD SOMEHOW
FILL THAT VOID,

AND, LIKE, YOU KNOW,
ENTERTAINMENT--

A LOT OF ENTERTAINERS
ARE THIS WAY.
AND SO I THINK PEOPLE--

IT'S REALLY--YOU JUST--
YOU WANT TO MAKE A MARK.

SO PEOPLE WHO ARE ONLINE
DOING THE COMMENTS

REALLY JUST WANT
TO MAKE A MARK.

THEY WANT
TO HAVE AN EFFECT.

SO I THINK WE SUFFER
FROM THE SAME THING,

WHICH IS JUST A LACK
OF ATTENTION AND LOVE.

- RIGHT.
WELL SAID.

VERY GOOD.
- ALL RIGHT, THANK YOU.
- YEAH, THAT'S GOOD.
[applause]

YEAH, I THINK NO MATTER
HOW YOU'RE REACHING FOR IT,

EVERYBODY IS TRYING
TO FILL THEMSELVES UP
IN SOME WAY,

AND YOU GOT TO DO IT
YOURSELF,

AND YOU GOT TO FIND OUT
WHAT THAT IS

THAT MAKES YOU FEEL WHOLE
AND FEEL GOOD.
WHAT SCARED YOU THE MOST?

WHAT GOT YOU OUT
OF THAT BEHAVIOR, THAT PATTERN?

- JAIL.
- OH.
- YEAH, JAIL.

JAIL IS QUITE SCARY.
- DID YOU GO TO JAIL?

- YEAH, I WAS IN JAIL.
- UH-HUH.

- YEAH.
- OH, FOR HOW LONG?

- I WAS THERE FOR--
IT FELT LIKE FOREVER.

I THINK 24 HOURS
OR 25 HOURS.

- WOW, WELL,
THAT'S LONG ENOUGH

TO KNOW YOU DON'T WANT
TO BE IN JAIL.

- YEAH, IT WAS NO GOOD.
- YEAH.

WAS THAT YOUR FIRST TIME?
- NO, NO.

NO, BUT THIS
WAS THE WORST TIME.

I MEAN, I REALLY WENT
ALL THE WAY WITH IT.

THEY PUT A HANNIBAL MASK ON ME
AND A LEAD JACKET,

AND IT WAS
JUST REALLY ROUGH.

- WOW.
- YEAH, IT WAS VERY SCARY.

- YOU MUST'VE DONE SOMETHING
VERY, VERY BAD.

- YEAH, I SPIT ON A COP.
IT'S A NO-NO.

THAT'S A BIG NO-NO.
I'M SORRY.

IF YOU'RE WATCHING,
DUDE, I'M SORRY, MAN.

THAT WAS CRAZY,
YOU KNOW?

- YEAH, BUT YOU'RE NOW
ALL GOOD.

- YEAH, I MEAN, I'M AS GOOD
AS I CAN BE, SURE.
[laughter]

- I'M JUST GONNA SIT OVER HERE.
- SORRY.
ELLEN.

- UH-OH.
DID YOU WANT TO SEE MORE VIDEOS?
HOLD ON.
[cheers and applause]

- THIS IS MY FIRST TIME
ON A TALK SHOW.

- WHAT IS IT, NOAH?
- MY FIRST TIME ON A TALK SHOW.

- OH, MAN.
WELCOME.
[cheers and applause]
[laughter]

title: Shia LaBeouf Opens Up About His Recent History

comments.text:
You're walking in the woods.
There's no one around, 
And your phone is dead.
Out of the corner of your eye you spot him, 
Shia Labeouf.

He's following you
About 30 feet back.
He gets down on all fours and breaks into a sprint.
He's gaining on you.
Shia Labeouf.

You're looking for your car, 
But you're all turned around.
He's almost upon you now
And you can see there's blood on his face! 
My god, there's blood everywhere! 

Running for your life
(From Shia Labeouf.)
He's brandishing a knife.
(It's Shia Labeouf.)
Lurking in the shadows
Hollywood superstar Shia Labeouf.
Living in the woods, 
(Shia Labeouf.)
Killing for sport, 
(Shia Labeouf.)
Eating all the bodies
Actual, cannibal Shia Labeouf.

Now it's dark and you seem to have lost him, 
But you're hopelessly lost yourself.
Stranded with a murderer, 
You creep silently through the underbrush.
A-ha! In the distance, 
A small cottage with a light on.
Hope! 
You move stealthily toward it, 
But your leg! AH! It's caught in a bear trap! 

Gnawing off your leg, 
(Quiet, quiet.)
Limping toward the cottage, 
(Quiet, quiet.)
Now you're on the doorstep, 
Sitting inside, Shia Labeouf.
Sharpening an ax, 
(Shia Labeouf.)
But he doesn't hear you enter, 
(Shia Labeouf.)
You're sneaking up behind him.
Strangling superstar Shia Labeouf.
Fighting for your life with Shia Labeouf, 
Wrestling a knife from Shia Labeouf, 
Stab it in his kidney.
Safe at last from Shia Labeouf.

You limp into the dark woods, 
Blood oozing from your stump leg.
But you have won.
You have beaten Shia Labeouf﻿

comments.text:
Shia is one of the most humble people you will ever meet. I think when he 
was younger, he abused that 'Hollywood' stardom to his advantage. He's 
grown up, he's grown to know what has been right and wrong in his life. I 
was not a fan of him until after all this negativity came along. He was in 
Sia's video (which is a beautiful art piece) & he admitted to making 
mistakes (which all of us can relate to, yet a lot of us cannot admit to). 
It takes a strong person to admit their mistakes and become a better person 
from them. <3 Shia. Keep up the positive vibes.﻿

you creep silently through the underbrush

blood oozing from your stump leg
